Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110116 Firefox/4.0b10pre

Horizontal line appears in title bar (screenshot) on mouse click under application button

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. click under app button circa in place where line appears on screenshot
2. 
3.
Actual Results:  
unexpected horizontal line appears

Expected Results:  
no visual change

note: issue not present on every mouse click, however always present after window is maximized
comments.author: juloml@gmail.com

Issue appears to appear quite seldom.
